trending.reason: Yen Press announces the official US print license for the highly anticipated sequel, with a release date set for June 2026.

articles.title: Solo Leveling: Ragnarok Gets U.S. Print Release
articles.excerpt: Yen Press has officially announced its acquisition of the print license for Solo Leveling: Ragnarok, with the first volume scheduled for release in the U.S. in June 2026.
articles.author: CBR
articles.fullContent:
Solo Leveling Sequel 'Ragnarok' Secures US Print Deal

Yen Press confirmed it has acquired the print license for the highly anticipated 'Solo Leveling: Ragnarok' manhwa, announcing the news at New York Comic-Con 2025. The first volume is set to be published under its K-comics imprint, Ize Press, and is scheduled for a U.S. release in June 2026. This move finally brings the popular sequel to a print format for English-speaking audiences, who previously could only access it digitally on platforms like Tapas.

A New Generation

The story follows Sung Suho, the son of the original series protagonist Sung Jinwoo and Cha Haein, as he navigates the legacy left by his powerful father. 'Ragnarok' was originally a web novel written by Daul and has been adapted into a manhwa with artwork by JIN and Brix of REDICE Studio, the same studio behind the original series' art.

Is it a Direct Sequel?

While Ize Press is marketing 'Ragnarok' as a continuation, recent comments from the original 'Solo Leveling' author, Chugong, have introduced some ambiguity. Chugong stated that 'Ragnarok' is more like one of many possible scenarios in the 'Solo Leveling' universe, similar to Marvel's parallel universes, and not a direct continuation of his main plot. This has led to some disappointment among fans who considered it the official canon sequel.

Key Takeaways

  • US Release: 'Solo Leveling: Ragnarok' will receive an official English print release in June 2026.
  • Publisher: Yen Press will publish the manhwa under its Ize Press imprint.
  • New Protagonist: The sequel focuses on Sung Suho, the son of Sung Jinwoo.
  • Canon Debate: Original author Chugong has described 'Ragnarok' as an alternate universe story rather than a direct sequel.

articles.title: Growing Demand for 3D Artists in Perth
articles.excerpt: The job market for 3D Artists in Perth is showing strong activity, with multiple vacancies available for various levels of experience in industrial design, animation, and marketing.
articles.author: Seek
articles.fullContent:
Perth's Creative Sector Seeks 3D Artists

Perth's design and architecture sector is actively recruiting 3D artists, with a range of new job opportunities appearing daily. Roles are available for various skill levels, from entry-level to experienced modellers, indicating a healthy demand for CGI professionals in the region. These positions span across industries including architectural visualisation, product design, and animation for marketing campaigns.

Skills in Demand

Employers are seeking candidates proficient in industry-standard software such as 3ds Max, Blender, and Unreal Engine 5. Key responsibilities often involve creating high-quality 3D models from technical drawings, texturing assets, and producing CGI for marketing. Strong portfolios are essential for applicants, and experience with animation and the ability to read architectural plans are highly desirable skills.

Career Opportunities

The available roles offer diverse work arrangements, including full-time, part-time, and casual positions, with some offering flexible or hybrid work models. Companies are looking for passionate individuals to join creative teams and contribute to high-end architectural and product CGI projects. The market shows potential for significant career growth for the right candidates.

Key Points

  • High Demand: Multiple job openings for 3D artists in Perth.
  • Required Skills: Proficiency in Blender, 3ds Max, and Unreal Engine is commonly required.
  • Industry Focus: Opportunities are concentrated in architectural visualisation and product CGI.
  • Flexible Roles: A mix of full-time, part-time, and hybrid work arrangements are available.

articles.title: Solo Leveling Author Reveals His Favourite Story Moment
articles.excerpt: In a recent interview, 'Solo Leveling' author Chugong revealed that his favourite scene in the series is not a major battle, but the emotional moment where Jinwoo cries after healing his mother.
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.fullContent:
Author's Favourite Scene Surprises Fans

Chugong, the author of the 'Solo Leveling' web novel, has revealed his favourite moment from the series is the emotionally charged scene where protagonist Sung Jinwoo cries after healing his mother from the Eternal Slumber disease. In an interview with LitRes, Chugong stated that while he enjoyed writing action sequences like the Red Gate Arc, the heartfelt reunion with Jinwoo's mother was the moment that resonated with him the most.

A Moment of Humanity

The scene stands out in a series known for its relentless action and Jinwoo's increasingly stoic demeanour. It is a rare moment that pushes aside his immense power to reveal his underlying humanity and the core motivation for his dangerous journey. This choice surprised many fans, particularly as the scene received some backlash from viewers who felt it detracted from Jinwoo's powerful aura.

Fan Reaction and Author's Insight

The author's selection highlights a contrast between creator intent and audience reception. While many fans are drawn to Jinwoo's incredible power and cool-headedness in battle, Chugong's preference for this quiet, emotional scene suggests he places a high value on the character's personal journey and emotional depth. It serves as a reminder that the story's heart lies not just in the epic fights, but in the personal stakes involved.

Key Takeaways

  • Author's Choice: Chugong's favourite scene is when Jinwoo cries after healing his mother.
  • Emotional Core: The moment highlights Jinwoo's humanity amidst constant battles.
  • Fan Surprise: The selection was unexpected for many fans who focus on the action elements of the series.
  • Creator vs. Audience: It reveals a focus on character-driven moments from the author's perspective.

articles.title: IT Helpdesk Analyst Role Available in Perth
articles.excerpt: An opportunity for an IT Helpdesk Analyst has opened up in Perth, seeking a candidate to provide technical support and join a dynamic client-focused team.
articles.author: activIT systems
articles.fullContent:
Role Overview

A Perth-based IT service provider is seeking an IT Helpdesk Analyst to join their team. The role involves delivering a wide variety of support tasks, including day-to-day IT support, system builds, user account management, and software support, with exposure to first-level cybersecurity incident response.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide helpdesk support for triage and remediation of inbound requests via emails, calls, and remote service.
  • Deploy new user accounts and system builds as part of business-as-usual support.
  • Administer and implement Microsoft 365 and other cloud services.
  • Install PCs, laptops, printers, servers, and network devices for clients.
  • Track and record all work performed within the job management system.

Required Qualifications

  • Experience: Some experience providing IT support is required.
  • Technical Skills: Good technical aptitude, with CompTIA A+ certification or equivalent experience.
  • Soft Skills: Strong problem-solving skills, common sense, and the ability to work autonomously. A desire to deliver excellent customer service is essential.

What We Offer

  • A professional development programme to build on your skills.
  • A positive team culture in a modern office environment.
  • Exposure to a wide range of technologies and cybersecurity tasks.

üìç Location: Perth, WA

Application Instructions

Candidates must be eligible to work in Australia, hold a Class C driver's license with a reliable vehicle, and be able to obtain a Western Australian police clearance. Applications can be submitted through the company's career page.

Key Points

  • Role: IT Helpdesk Analyst
  • Key Requirement: Experience in IT support and Microsoft 365 administration.
  • Work Arrangement: On-site in Perth.
  • Essential: Australian work eligibility and a valid driver's license.

articles.title: Solo Leveling Author Clarifies 'Ragnarok' Sequel Status
articles.excerpt: Chugong, the author of Solo Leveling, has clarified that the sequel 'Ragnarok' is not a direct continuation of his story, but rather one of many possible universes for the series.
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.fullContent:
'Ragnarok' Confirmed as an Alternate Universe Story

The author of 'Solo Leveling', Chugong, has clarified the canonical status of the sequel 'Solo Leveling: Ragnarok', revealing it is not a direct continuation of the original plot. In a recent interview, he explained that fans should view 'Ragnarok', which was written by Daul, as one of many possible alternate universes for the series, drawing a comparison to Marvel's multiverse concept.

A Disappointment for Some Fans

This revelation has been met with disappointment from some fans who had accepted 'Ragnarok' as the official sequel. The story follows Sung Suho, the son of Sung Jinwoo, but Chugong's comments imply that this character and storyline might not exist in a future sequel penned by himself. The author has also mentioned that he is considering writing his own sequel, which would likely focus on Jinwoo again.

What This Means for the Universe

While 'Ragnarok' is still considered a canonical part of the wider 'Solo Leveling' universe, it now exists as a parallel story rather than a linear progression. This opens the door for Chugong to explore different paths and outcomes for his characters in future works, without being constrained by the events of 'Ragnarok'. For now, Sung Suho's story begins and ends with 'Ragnarok'.

Key Takeaways

  • Not a Direct Sequel: Author Chugong confirmed 'Ragnarok' is an alternate universe story.
  • Written by Daul: The sequel was penned by another author, not Chugong.
  • Fan Reaction: The news has disappointed some fans who saw it as the official continuation.
  • Future Possibilities: Chugong may write his own sequel, which could disregard the events of 'Ragnarok'.

articles.title: Casual Graphic Designer Position Opens in Perth
articles.excerpt: A casual role for a Graphic Designer is now available in Perth, focusing on the creation of marketing materials and supporting a broader design team.
articles.author: Jora
articles.fullContent:
Role Overview

A Perth-based organisation is looking for a creative and skilled Graphic Designer to join their team on a casual basis. The position involves working on a diverse range of projects, creating visual assets for both print and digital channels, and translating business goals into compelling visual stories.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop innovative designs for a variety of materials including web pages, marketing collateral, newsletters, and internal communications.
  • Collaborate with marketing and other teams to translate strategic direction into high-quality visual content.
  • Manage the design process from concept to final deliverable, ensuring brand consistency.
  • Prepare sketches, layouts, and finished artwork for both print and digital media.

Required Qualifications

  • Experience: Proven experience in a graphic design role with a strong portfolio.
  • Technical Skills: Proficiency with design software such as Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign is essential.
  • Soft Skills: Exceptional creativity, excellent communication skills, and the ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

What We Offer

  • A flexible, casual work arrangement.
  • The opportunity to work on a wide range of creative projects.
  • A collaborative and supportive team environment.

üìç Location: Perth, WA

Application Instructions

Interested applicants should prepare a portfolio showcasing their design skills and apply through the relevant job portal. The application should demonstrate both creativity and a strong understanding of brand identity.

Key Points

  • Role: Casual Graphic Designer
  • Key Requirement: Strong skills in Adobe Creative Suite and a compelling portfolio.
  • Work Arrangement: Casual, on-site in Perth.
  • Focus: Creating visual content for print and digital marketing channels.

articles.title: Job Opening: Senior Desktop Engineer in Perth
articles.excerpt: A contract role for a Senior Desktop Engineer is available in Perth, focusing on providing high-level helpdesk and IT support services.
articles.author: Peoplebank
articles.fullContent:
Role Overview

A leading organisation in Perth is seeking an experienced Senior Desktop Engineer for a contract position. The role is centred on providing advanced IT support, managing desktop environments, and resolving complex technical issues to ensure smooth business operations.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide Level 2/3 IT support for desktop hardware, software, and network issues.
  • Manage the deployment, configuration, and maintenance of desktop systems and applications.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve complex incidents related to operating systems, mobile devices, and peripherals.
  • Contribute to IT projects, including system upgrades and migrations.
  • Mentor junior support staff and develop technical documentation.

Required Qualifications

  • Experience: Proven experience in a senior desktop support or helpdesk engineer role.
  • Technical Skills: Expertise in Windows operating systems, Active Directory, Microsoft 365, and network troubleshooting.
  • Soft Skills: Strong problem-solving abilities, excellent communication skills, and a customer-focussed approach.

Nice-to-Have Skills

  • Experience with ITIL frameworks.
  • Certifications such as CompTIA A+ or Microsoft Certified Desktop Support Technician (MCDST).
  • Familiarity with virtualisation technologies.

What We Offer

  • A competitive contract rate.
  • Opportunity to work within a professional and dynamic IT team.
  • Exposure to a variety of technologies and IT projects.

üìç Location: Perth, WA (On-site)

Application Instructions

Interested candidates are encouraged to apply via the official Peoplebank website or contact their Perth office for more information on the application process.

Key Points

  • Role: Senior Desktop Engineer (Contract)
  • Key Requirement: Advanced IT support and troubleshooting skills
  • Work Arrangement: On-site in Perth
  • Application: Via Peoplebank recruitment agency

articles.title: What Happens When AI Models Starve for Fresh Knowledge?
articles.excerpt: A phenomenon known as "model collapse" threatens the future of generative AI, where models trained on their own synthetic data begin to lose accuracy and originality.
articles.author: Gopenai
articles.fullContent:
The Looming Risk of AI Model Collapse

Generative AI models are degrading in performance because they are increasingly trained on AI-generated synthetic data, a phenomenon known as "model collapse". This feedback loop causes models to forget the diversity of real-world data, leading to outputs that are less creative, more repetitive, and sometimes factually incorrect. As more of the internet becomes populated with AI-generated content, the risk of polluting future training datasets grows, threatening the long-term progress of artificial intelligence.

Forgetting Reality

Model collapse occurs when an AI starts to learn from its own outputs, or those of other models. In this recursive process, any small errors or biases in the generated data are amplified in subsequent generations of models. Researchers have found this leads to models forgetting the extremes or "tails" of the original data distribution, causing them to favour more common and safer responses, which ultimately reduces the variety and originality of their output.

Expert Perspectives on Data Pollution

Experts warn that this self-consuming cycle poses a fundamental threat to the development of generative AI. Without careful curation and a steady stream of fresh, human-generated data, AI systems risk converging on a distorted and simplified version of reality. This data pollution could have significant consequences in critical applications like medical diagnostics or financial modelling, where inaccuracies can lead to costly or dangerous outcomes.

"Model collapse is what happens when AI models are trained on synthetic, AI-generated content -- as opposed to human-generated content -- and degrade. Simply put, it's a feedback loop." - TechTarget

The Path Forward

To combat model collapse, a greater emphasis on data quality and diversity is essential. Solutions include better methods for identifying and filtering out synthetic data from training sets, as well as actively curating high-quality, human-verified data. Organisations are recognising that the foundation of a reliable AI model is not just the volume of data, but its authenticity and richness, a challenge that will become more critical as AI-generated content proliferates.

Key Takeaways

  • Model Collapse: A degradation in AI performance caused by training on AI-generated data, leading to a loss of diversity and accuracy.
  • Amplified Errors: The process creates a feedback loop where errors and biases are magnified over successive model generations.
  • Data Curation is Crucial: The primary solution is to ensure future AI models are trained on curated, high-quality, human-generated data to avoid pollution.
  • Real-World Impact: The consequences include less creative AI tools and potential failures in critical systems that rely on AI for decision-making.

articles.title: The Top 10 Video Generation Models of 2025
articles.excerpt: A comprehensive list of the leading open-source and proprietary AI video generation models that are redefining creative possibilities in media and content creation.
articles.author: DataCamp
articles.fullContent:
AI Redefines Video Creation in 2025

The field of artificial intelligence has achieved a new milestone with the release of advanced text-to-video generation models capable of producing high-fidelity, cinematic content from simple text prompts. These models build upon the foundation of image generation but add the complexity of temporal coherence, ensuring that motion, characters, and scenes remain consistent over time. This technology is rapidly transforming industries from marketing and advertising to film production.

A New Era of Creative Tools

AI video generators work by interpreting text prompts to create a sequence of images that form a coherent video. Modern systems now offer sophisticated controls over camera movement, character consistency, and art direction, allowing creators to produce professional-quality clips without traditional equipment. The leading models of 2025 represent a significant leap in realism, prompt adherence, and overall output quality.

Leading Video Generation Models

The landscape of AI video generation is populated by a mix of powerful proprietary systems from major tech companies and versatile open-source projects. Each model offers unique strengths, from photorealism to specific artistic styles.

  • Google Veo 3: A state-of-the-art model known for producing high-fidelity, cinematic clips with excellent realism and temporal consistency.
  • Kling 2.5 Turbo: Recognised for its advanced camera control, physics-aware realism, and film-grade aesthetics.
  • OpenAI Sora: A powerful model capable of generating high-resolution, long-duration videos with a deep understanding of prompts.
  • Hailuo 02: Excels in creating scenes that require realistic physics and can output natively in 1080p.
  • Runway Gen-3: A versatile, production-ready model used for high-quality storytelling and creative content.

Future Outlook and Broader Impact

The rapid advancement of AI video generation tools is democratising content creation, enabling individuals and small teams to produce visually stunning narratives that were previously only possible for large studios. As these models become more accessible and powerful, they are expected to have a profound impact on social media, entertainment, and digital marketing, offering new avenues for storytelling and audience engagement.

Key Takeaways

  • Rapid Advancement: AI text-to-video technology has matured significantly, enabling the creation of high-quality, coherent video from text prompts.
  • Top Contenders: Key models like Google's Veo 3, Kling 2.5 Turbo, and OpenAI's Sora are leading the market with advanced features and realism.
  • Creative Control: Modern platforms offer detailed control over cinematic elements, including camera angles, motion, and character consistency.
  • Industry Transformation: AI video generation is set to revolutionise marketing, filmmaking, and content creation across various media.

articles.title: Make.com Integrates Latest AI Models from OpenAI and Gemini
articles.excerpt: The automation platform Make.com has expanded its AI capabilities by integrating new advanced models from OpenAI and Google's Vertex AI, including GPT-4.1 and Gemini 2.5 Pro.
articles.author: Make.com
articles.fullContent:
Make.com Enhances AI Automation Capabilities

The no-code automation platform Make.com has announced the integration of the latest and most advanced AI models from OpenAI and Google Vertex AI. Users can now leverage OpenAI's GPT-4.1 and o4 models, alongside Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro, directly within their automated workflows, enabling more powerful and intelligent business process solutions.

Access to Cutting-Edge AI

This update provides Make.com users with direct access to state-of-the-art AI technologies. The integration is designed to help businesses automate more complex tasks, from data analysis and content generation to sophisticated decision-making processes. The newly supported models offer enhanced reasoning, improved accuracy, and faster response times for a wide range of applications.

Newly Integrated Models

ProviderModelKey Feature
OpenAIGPT-4.1Enhanced reasoning and problem-solving
OpenAIo4Optimised for complex tasks and accuracy
Google Vertex AIGemini 2.5 FlashFaster responses for everyday tasks
Google Vertex AIGemini 2.5 ProAdvanced capabilities for complex scenarios

Implications for Automation

By incorporating these next-generation models, Make.com reinforces its position as a versatile tool for AI-driven automation. Businesses can now build more sophisticated scenarios that analyse images, extract structured data, and create nuanced content with greater efficiency. The update, which also includes minor UI enhancements, allows for the creation of smarter, more adaptive workflows without requiring any coding knowledge.

Key Takeaways

  • New Integrations: Make.com has added support for OpenAI's GPT-4.1 and Google's Gemini 2.5 models.
  • Enhanced Power: Users can now build more intelligent automations with improved reasoning, speed, and accuracy.
  • No-Code Access: The platform continues to provide access to advanced AI for non-developers through its visual interface.
  • Broader Capabilities: The new models expand the potential for automating complex tasks in data analysis, content creation, and workflow management.
